name: Dapper Dino Dond And The Holy Matrimony Of Those Beyond The Waves
name_original: Dapper Dino Dond And The Holy Matrimony Of Those Beyond The Waves
description:
Dond wakes up after crashing the sacred wedding to find himself on a boat with a strange wizard and his own spirit  and is tasked with saving as many as he can from the oncoming storm and wedding of those beyond the waves
